West_Palm_Beach.Palm Beach County Convention Center: The Palm Beach County Convention Center is a multi-purpose facility in West Palm Beach, Florida, managed by Spectra Venue Management. The facility opened in January 2004 and hosts many high profile events. It is connected via covered walkway to the Hilton West Palm Beach hotel, and is located across the street from CityPlace, an upscale shopping district with nightlife, restaurants and shopping.
